ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Controller

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cmput301f14t16.easya.Controller.MainController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NewAnswerController, NewQuestionController, NewReplyController

    public abstract class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a simple controller used to add a Content object to the elastic search database.

    • Method Detail

      • submit

        protected boolean submit()
                  throws NoInternetException
        Attempts to submit pending to the elastic search database. This method will initially attempt to check for an Internet connection using InternetCheck , and will fail if it returns False.
        Returns:
        True if pending was successfully submitted. False if not.
        Throws:
        NoInternetException - If the method's attempt to check for an Internet connection using InternetCheck returns False.

      • submitOffline

        protected void submitOffline()
        Pushes pending to the currently running instance of Queue. Sets submitedOffline to True.

      • saveOfflineContent

        protected void saveOfflineContent()

      • getQuestionId

        public java.lang.String getQuestionId()
        Returns:
        pending's Pending.questionId field if the contained content is an Answer with a parent Question, or the contained Content's own ID otherwise.
